mobilization_tools.blurb_post_unlock: As believers, we are called to make multiplying disciples! Form a Disciple Making Community with other believers and use these tools to learn and practice Disciple Making together.
mobilization_tools.blurb_pre_unlock: Enabling Mobilization Tools adds additional content to Waha. The unlock code is passed from user to user, so you’ll need to find a user with the code to unlock this content.
mobilization_tools.enter_code: Enter code to unlock the Mobilization Tools
mobilization_tools.share_message_1: Here is how to access the Waha Mobilization Tools:
mobilization_tools.share_message_2: 1. Download Waha from the Google Play Store or Apple App Store
mobilization_tools.share_message_3: 2. After installing your language, tap the group icon in the top corner
mobilization_tools.too_many_attempts: Too many attempts. Try again in
mobilization_tools.unlock_successful_message: The Mobilization Tools are now unlocked.

onboarding.onboarding_1_message: Use Waha to discover God’s Word with friends or family.
onboarding.onboarding_2_message: Facilitating a meeting is easy. Just press pause after each discussion question.
onboarding.onboarding_3_message: Each story brings your group insight into the love and purpose of God.
onboarding.onboarding_4_title: Already have a group in mind?

other.app_store_listing: Discover God’s living truth & purpose for your life through the Bible! The Waha app facilitates your small group meeting through an interactive, engaging, audio-based format. It’s kind of like putting the world’s best bible study small group leader into your pocket! Waha's discipleship lessons use the wildly effective Discovery Bible Study format and allow anyone to facilitate a group that's focused on discovering and applying God’s Word together. The audio (or text) lessons in this app will empower you to effortlessly guide your group through the meeting & the discovery of God’s word. Discover topics like: The story of creation How sin entered the world The penalty of our sin God’s plan to redeem mankind God’s vision to change the world ——————- “This is the next-level of discovery bible study apps” (5 / 5) “We have been needing an app like this to assist catalyzing DMM for a long time...a centralized technology with a decentralized model for quickly on-boarding content for many languages. I would love to see 100 dialects on Waha as soon as possible” - Stan Parks, 24:14 Facilitator & Leading Movement Researcher ———————- Features *Available in multiple languages *Download lessons for offline use *Easily share bible stories (both text or audio) *Track your progress with multiple groups *Envision and mobilize other believers to make disciples ——————— Download Waha today!
other.screenshot1: Discover God’s Story with Friends or Family
other.screenshot2: Easily Facilitate a Group Discovery Bible Study
other.screenshot4: Start Multiple Groups and Track Progress

security.no_match_message: Please try entering a passcode again.
security.onboarding_1_message: Security Mode locks Waha behind a passcode screen disguised as a piano app.
security.onboarding_2_message: This keeps Waha’s content hidden from prying eyes for those in security-conscious areas.
security.onboarding_3_message: The piano app acts just like your phone’s unlock screen, so simply enter your custom passcode on the numbered keys to get back into Waha.
security.onboarding_4_message: If you’d like to enable Security Mode, set your passcode on the next screen by tapping the button below.
security.security_mode_blurb: Security mode locks Waha behind a passcode screen disguised as a piano app. Unlock by entering your passcode on the keys. This mode is intended for those in security-conscious areas.
